articles.description: “She was just thrilled that there is a Barbie with Down syndrome out there," one mom says.
articles.content:
A Barbie with Down syndrome has been featured in the Fashionistas line. (Photo: Mattel; Illustration by Aisha Yousaf for Yahoo)
Barbie may have started off as a tall, busty, blonde, but Mattel has c… [+5466 chars]
